welcome: Welcome to Simple AI (simple-ai.io)! ğŸš€ Simple AI is an AI chat application, a ChatGPT alternative, focused on providing a quick and more professional user experience. Type your query and press `Enter` to chat with the AI.ğŸ’¬
quick_start_0: Simple AI operates using a command interface, shortcuts and gestures. Commands all begin with `:` (half-width colon).
quick_start_1: First, register a user with command `:user add [username] [email] [password?]`.ğŸ”‘ Note: Do not include the brackets in your command.âœ… For example, `:user add john john@example.com ********`
quick_start_2: To log in, use the command `:login [username] [password]`.
quick_start_3: Forgot your password? Reset it using the command `:user reset pass [username] [email]`.ğŸ†˜
quick_start_4: To access the Documentation and confirm Usage, click the dot (â€¢) in the screen corner.ğŸ“„
quick_start_5: A set of chats is called a `session`. To navigate between logs in a `session`, use the `â¬…ï¸` and `â¡ï¸` arrow keys. Or swipe left and right on smartphones.ğŸ“± To navigate between `sessions`, use the `â¬†ï¸` and `â¬‡ï¸` arrow keys.
quick_start_6: Use `:use "Midjourney"` to enable image generation.â›µ Use `:use "WolframAlpha"` to enable enhanced mathematics.ğŸ›ï¸
quick_start_7: Switch to fullscreen with `F11` (âŒƒF11 for macOS). For split screen, use `Ctrl+|`.ğŸ–¥ï¸
quick_start_9: A general `user` account is free, but you have to pay for OpenAI API tokens. You can manage your token balance on the Usage page.ğŸ’³
